climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 24 FAMILY MEGA ROLLS: Cottonelle Ultra Comfort Toilet Paper with Cushiony CleaningRipples Texture, 2-Ply, 24 Family Mega Rolls (4 packs of 6); 325 sheets per roll.
GENTLE SUSTAINABLE TOILET PAPER: Cottonelle Ultra Comfort toilet tissue leaves you comfortably dry with premium softness that cleans gently, removes moisture and is safe for sensitive skin.
ABSORBENT TOILET TISSUE: Super soft, quality 2-ply toilet paper is septic-safe and 3x more absorbent** to keep your hands and bottom protected and clean as you wipe.
TOILET TISSUE FOR A HEALTHY CLEAN: Use Cottonelle toilet paper and Cottonelle flushable wet wipes together for a refreshing, shower fresh clean.

FSC-CERTIFIED TOILET TISSUE: Cottonelle is FSC certified ensuring we source from responsibility managed forests to prevent deforestation and only uses fibers that are 100% plant-based and free of harsh chemicals.
body.description: Get the superior performance and softness you’ve been waiting for with Cottonelle Ultra Comfort Toilet Paper with Cushiony CleaningRipples Texture, designed to leave you comfortably dry. The extra soft cleaning ripples are safe for sensitive skin and cleans gently while removing more moisture*. Premium, soft 2-ply toilet paper, Cottonelle Ultra Comfort toilet tissue is 3x more absorbent than the leading value brand in order protect your hands and bottom as you clean up. Cottonelle is septic-safe and clog-free. Each Family Mega Rolls has 325 sheets per roll so you can worry less about running out when you or guests at your home need it most. Looking for more ways to feel clean down there after taking care of business? Use Cottonelle flushable wet wipes to feel shower fresh 3x longer***. Conveniently remain stocked on toilet paper by ordering Cottonelle for delivery to your door or pickup curbside. Cottonelle cares about you and our planet. We are proud to be FSC certified ensuring the forests we source from are responsibly managed to prevent deforestation and help protect the trees and animals that depend on them. We also use fibers that are 100% plant-based and no harsh chemicals or dyes.*vs. leading value brand regular rolls **vs. leading value brand ***using dry + wet vs dry alone

That's why Cottonelle is extra absorbent so you feel comfortably dry. 3x More Absorbent Ultra Comfort has soft cleaning ripples that are 3x more absorbent to reduce irritation The right kind of care for everybody’s down there Whether your down there is sensitive or steamy, Cottonelle gives you the clean you need. Next page 1 Down There Care 2 More Absorbent 3 The Right Care

Explore Cottonelle Products Ultra Comfort Add to Cart Ultra Clean Add to Cart FreshCare Flushable Wipes Add to Cart Gentle Plus Add to Cart FreshCare XL Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.8 out of 5 stars 711 4.8 out of 5 stars 348 4.7 out of 5 stars 125,055 4.7 out of 5 stars 4,624 4.6 out of 5 stars 12,970 Price $34.56$34.56 $34.56$34.56 $14.74$14.74 $33.79$33.79 $29.50$29.50 Best for Residue Removal ✘ ✔ ✔ ✘ ✔ Best for Skin Comfort ✔ ✘ ✘ ✔ ✔ Contains Aloe & Vitamin E ✘ ✘ ✘ ✔ ✘ 40% Larger vs. Standard Wipes ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘ ✔ Safe For Sensitive Skin ✘ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ Plastic-Free Renewable Fibers ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ FSC Certified ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Clog-Free & Septic Safe ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔

Why Cottonelle? No matter how you roll, Cottonelle’s sustainable, premium toilet paper and flushable wipes help you feel ahhh-mazing—our soft and strong bathroom essentials meet strict standards to protect forests and the animals and people that depend on them. What’s the difference between Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper and Cottonelle Ultra Comfort Toilet Paper? Our Ultra Clean toilet tissue is designed to remove more residue* to help you feel confidently clean. Our Ultra Comfort toilet tissue is designed to absorb more moisture* to help you feel comfortably clean. *vs. leading value brand What’s CleaningRipples Texture? Those little ripples are designed to help you clean the best so you can feel your best! They hold shape when wet, which means removing more residue* (Ultra Clean) and absorbing more moisture* (Ultra Comfort) with every wipe. *vs. leading value brand What’s a Mega Roll? It’s mega-amazing: Each Mega Roll lasts 4x longer than the leading brand’s regular roll, so you don’t have to change rolls as often. How many square feet are in Cottonelle Toilet Paper? Cottonelle is designed with you in mind, and that means tons of different sizes to help you find the perfect roll. Giant + Roll: 30.60 square feet per roll. Mega Roll: 32.90 square feet per roll. Family Mega Roll: 40.90 square feet per roll.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevating Daily Comfort to Luxurious Heights!
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: Cottonelle Ultra Comfort is a game-changer. Luxurious, abundant, and durable. Transforms the bathroom experience.Cottonelle Ultra Comfort Toilet Paper, you've been a revelation in my daily routine! It's as if my bathroom has been graced with the Rolls-Royce of toilet papers. This product is not just a necessity; it's a luxury.The presentation screams elegance. Opening a pack feels like an inauguration into a lavish lifestyle. With 24 Family Mega Rolls, it's like owning an endless treasure trove. I joke about having enough to share with the whole block and still having reserves for decades.The texture is heavenly. Each sheet is akin to the softest, fluffiest cloud caressing the skin. The cushiony cleaning ripples are a pampering treat for my behind, tempting me to place a roll in every room just for the tactile pleasure.The 2-ply construction is brilliant. It's robust yet gentle, offering a reliable clean with a comforting touch. It feels like an action-packed adventure in hygiene, making each bathroom visit surprisingly exciting.With 325 sheets per roll, it's like unraveling a scroll of endless softness. I half-expect to discover ancient wisdom etched between the sheets.In sum, Cottonelle Ultra Comfort has transformed my bathroom into a sanctuary of softness and luxury. It's elevated my daily comfort to celestial levels. I can't imagine returning to ordinary toilet paper after this. Cottonelle, you've set the bar stratospherically high!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good product for price. Durable and soft. Get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Now this should be on a commercial!
reviews.reviewText: This is putting those cute “TissueBears” to shame!!! So soft, this tissue feel is like a baby wipe without the water. Nicely textured and durable yet easy on the environment when flushing. More water soluble that before. Dissipates quickly! It’s less expensive than the other “C” brand and lasts longer…I’m sure to come back for more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This toilet paper is not always carried in stock at our nearest grocery stores. We were thankful to find it available here on Amazon. It’s soft, thick and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars When almost isn't good enough, use Cottonelle in the bathroom! :-)
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is great. Is it the cheapest? No. Is it available on sale? Not too often in the larger packages. Is it the best toilet paper out there? I'd say yes. Buy it and see what your opinion is! Remember, opinions are like ...holes. So use Cottonelle on your "opinion" and see if you want to go back to other brands!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Narrow rolls but good none the less!
reviews.reviewText: This is some great quality wipe- only complaint is the rolls are narrow compared to other brands. About 1/2" narrower roll. That being said, the tp is strong and gentle at the same time. Some are very harsh and some do not clean well- this does both extremely well. Recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft, absorbent, and hasn’t stopped my toilet up yet.You don’t have to use as mush as other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and plush !

reviews.reviewText: The long lasting and strong product I returned to after trying other brands. You do get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don’t understand all the great reviews, this is poor quality paper. Thinner and smaller than a sheet of Andrex, see photo. Will not buy again, only good for one thing!

This bathroom tissue, is VERY absorbent compared to all other brands & you will use a quarter the amount compared to what you will use using other brands.I first bought it as we needed some & it happened to be on sale at my local drug store, so grabbed two packages & won't buy anything else moving forward. Try it you will be impressed with the quality for the price point.
Not the softest but good value if you can catch it on sale. The 3x rolls are very large diameter.
